short_summary: Contract to purchase rank-type awards for the acquisition of a procurement system for the national judiciary
description: The contract involves the purchase of services to be rendered under a rank-type award for the acquisition of a procurement system. The contract also includes clerical services related to the preparation, modeling, and provision of budget materials in support of management decision-making.  In addition, the contract provides for services for sound practices and training related to the acquisition and use of a procurement system.
duration_in_months: Our estimate is that the contract will last approximately 30 months.which is the same duration as one of type NIG contracts available on the procurement system.
